articles.author: Andy Pasztor
articles.title: Drone Rules Likely Delayed, Grounding Growth
articles.description: Many agree drones need electronic license plates before they can deliver packages or fly remotely over crowds. But few agree on how to create those ID tags, and federal officials are far behind schedule on issuing guidance.
